title: How does remote education via digital learning work? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mobile and cloud technologies are the key role player that leverages digital learning and in a way remote education. Mobile technology is one of the important aspects that has digitally transformed education, providing advanced mediums for learning and paving a path towards effortless remote or distance education. Remote education has been gaining high significance over the years and has become a necessity owing to the pandemic situation that the whole world is witnessing. Technology is many forms have infused into the basic classroom education, which has also facilitated students to learn remotely irrespective of any geographical location. Remote education has been the saviour allowing students to learn unstoppably. Digital learning education like Tablets, Smartphones, Laptops etc constitute major remote learning devices managed by organizations through cloud technology based mobile device management for education and deployed among the students for remote learning. Remote learning and use of mobile technologies can have both pros and cons. Advantage of remote education or distance learning Allows students to learn from any locationWidens scope of learningIncreases learner’s productivity and efficiencyAllows to explore and learn infinitelyExposure to advanced technologies or learning devicesChallenges with remote education Misuse of technologies or learning devicesDistractionsSecurity issues related to educational data and informationLoss of educational devicesTechnical difficultiesetc. Cloud solutions like mobile device management solutions allow educational organizations to remotely manage and secure all deployed educational devices, thus simplifying and helping easy management of remote education. Thus with technologies, remote education is paving a path towards a new form of an educational system. You can also read this to know more 5 ways mobile device management helps in remote learning

All around the world, adults and children have been able to study on the internet by means of the Learning Management Systems (LMS) using the Smart Distance Learning (SDL) method. This is an exceptionally valuable method of distance education, which ensures the students in developing countries that they can continue their education at home. This has been the great triumph of companies that have come up with innovative methods to educate people. And now, the English language learning system in the form of online distance education via the open source technology and Learning Management Systems has made possible all these. Now that you know how does remote education via digital learning work? You need to take note of these few facts to get to grips with the situation, and gain a complete insight into the way things work. First, if you want to study online, then the most important thing is that you have a computer at home. The computer should be able to download software programs that will allow you to study. The best way to get these programs is to avail the course online, from a recognized training institute, which provides the courses at the lowest possible rates. In order to find out how does remote education via digital learning work? You need to go through the various online companies, and which ones offer the training packages and the online courses at a low price, or a free registration for an unlimited duration of time. With the training, you will be able to carry out various computer based activities in the learning environment. These tasks will help you learn the necessary techniques for learning English, and other important skills.
